glsa.title: Screenie: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage has been reported in Screenie, allowing for symlink attacks.

background.p: Screenie is a small screen frontend that is designed to be a session handler.

description.p: Dmitry E. Oboukhov reported that Screenie does not handle "/tmp/.screenie.#####" temporary files securely.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Screenie users should upgrade to the latest version:
